metadata.title: CVE-2023-5728 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: During garbage collection extra operations were performed on a object thatshould not be. This could have led to a potentially exploitable crash. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 119, Firefox ESR < 115.4, and Thunderbird <115.4.1.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
